name: clippy
description: Video downloader application using NestJS and Angular

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:electron
scripts.install:electron: cd electron && [ -f package.json ] && npm install || echo 'No electron/package.json found, skipping...'
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rimraf dist frontend/dist backend/dist
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:electron && npm run build:preload
scripts.build:backend: tsc -p backend/tsconfig.json && cd backend && npm run build
scripts.build:frontend: tsc -p frontend/tsconfig.json && cd frontend && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.electron:dev: npm run build:all && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run build:all && electron-builder build
scripts.package:win: npm run clean && npm run build:all && electron-builder build --win --publish never
scripts.package:linux: npm run clean && npm run build:all && electron-builder build --linux --publish never
scripts.package:mac: npm run clean && npm run build:all && electron-builder --mac
scripts.package:mac-intel: npm run clean && npm run build:all && electron-builder --mac --x64
